  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```{r}
library(ptrapr)
library(ggraph)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
path <- system.file("extdata/Nip_1_1_6307.ricepr", 
                   package = "ptrapr") 

panicle <-
  path %>% 
  read_panicle()
```


```{r}
panicle %>% 
  ggraph() + 
  geom_edge_link(arrow = grid::arrow(length = unit(0.08,
                                                   "inches"),
                                     type = "closed"),
                 colour = "grey30") +
  geom_node_point(aes(colour = type),
                  size = 2,
                  alpha =.7) +
  coord_fixed() +
  theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
panicle %>% 
  ggraph(layout = "dendrogram") + 
  geom_edge_diagonal()+
  geom_node_point(aes(colour = type),
                  size = 2,
                  alpha =.7) +
  coord_fixed() +
  theme_minimal()
```
